thread.title: Scott Disick checks into rehab for drug and alcohol addiction
thread.title_full: Scott Disick checks into rehab for drug and alcohol addiction - WCAX.COM Local Vermont News, Weather and Sports-

author: wcax.com
title: Scott Disick checks into rehab for drug and alcohol addiction
text:
By Shelli Weinstein, Scott Disick has checked into a Malibu rehab center for drug and alcohol addiction, UsWeekly reports.
This is Disick's third stint in a rehab facility this year. He spent a brief amount of time in a Costa Rica facility in March for hallucinogenic treatment and checked into a Florida rehab center in July.
Sources told TMZ that Disick has distanced himself from partying friends and hopes to get clean for his kids. Kourtney Kardashian currently won't allow Disick to have unsupervised visits with their three children until he's clean. The two split up over the summer.
Lamar Odom found unconscious in Nevada brothel
In other Kardashian-related news, just a few hours before Disick's rehab was reported, it was revealed that drugs were found in Lamar Odom 's system after he was found unconscious in a Nevada brothel. Odom had been married to Kourtney's sister Khloe for four years, though they have yet to finalize the divorce they filed for in December 2013.
Video: Scott Disick breaks down over Kourtney Kardashian breakup: "I have nobody"
